Package de.tubs.cs.iti.krypto.chiffre

Class Summary
BigIntegerUtils This class provides some special methods for BigInteger arithmetic that are useful for certain cryptographic algorithms.
BlockCipher This is the (abstract) superclass to hold blockcipher-algorithms, eg.
Charconvert This is a helper-class, containing some static methods for converting and handling characters in different sized character sets.
Cipher This is the (abstract) superclass to hold cipher-algorithms.
Krypto  
Tables This class holds the uni-, di- and trigraph-tables which are useful for breaking ciphers.
 

Exception Summary
CharconvertException Thrown by the ordMod and chrMod methods in class Charconvert to indicate that a character is invalid in this character set.
KryptoException This exception is thrown whenever a cipher's method cannot be performed (eg. breakCipher() in RSA-ciphers).
